name: Dead Drivers (Android-Full)
description:
Shoot zombies while driving.  Originally for the mix and jam 2020. Download and install the apk to play.

Controls:  Tilt your phone to steer (or use the slider if gyroscope is unavailable). Use the joystick at the bottom-right of your screen to aim. Press the button at the left to fire. Get the highest score you can!

made with Godot 3.2.3 stable

Click here to play the jam version

note: my code is really messy if ever you are going to check it out. it is uncommented and it uses unpractical tricks. I am working on improving my code
